name: niccc
author: AFNI Team
description: A program for conducting certain NIML tests on input from streamspec and write the results to stderr

inputs.description: A string defining a NIML stream
inputs.name: Stream specification

inputs.description: Duplicate the element before showing it. This is to test NI_duplicate function.
inputs.name: Duplicate Flag

inputs.description: Show header parts only in output
inputs.name: No Data Flag

inputs.description: Dump the value of attribute ATTR
inputs.name: Attribute

inputs.description: Match attribute: If MATCH is exact, then attribute name is matched exactly. If MATCH is partial, then a match of all the characters in ATTR is enough.
inputs.name: Match

inputs.description: Streamspec is an element string like: '<T font=9 coords="2.3 23 2"/>'
inputs.name: String Flag

inputs.description: Write elements to stdout, instead of stderr
inputs.name: Stdout Flag

inputs.description: Put the # at the beginning of lines with no data
inputs.name: Hash Flag

inputs.description: Quiet stderr messages, and don't echo attribute name with -attribute option
inputs.name: Quiet Flag

inputs.description: Only output elements that have an attribute ATTR of value ATTRVAL.
inputs.name: Find Attribute

inputs.description: Do not output elements that have an attribute ATTR of value ATTRVAL.
inputs.name: Skip Attribute
